meta-review.comment: Anuchard presents a charming and colorful adventure with a mix of dungeon exploration and city building. While the combat is simple and the puzzles are a bit too easy, the game offers a fun and somewhat repetitive experience. Its chapter-based structure and quirky style make it a delightful indie game for players looking for a lighthearted action RPG. And hey, who wouldn't want to ring some bells and cook up a storm in a fantasy world?
